instructions:
Melt butter in top of a double boiler and gradually stir in the confectioner's sugar. Continue stirring until
it becomes a creamy mixture and all melted butter has
disappeared. Add egg yolks and continue stirring for 2 minutes. Stir in the half and half and continue
heating until it thickens, stirring every 10 minutes. This may
take an hour. Stir in the liquor. Serve over plum pudding or mincemeat pie. Makes 1 cup of sauce.
ingredients: 3 tbsp of rum and brandy mixture
name: Hard Sauce
creator: "The Recipe"
